definition: to ask for trouble (idiom)/to make a rod for one's own back
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
to invite/to provoke/to demand or ask for/to send armed forces to suppress/to denounce or condemn/to marry (a woman)/to discuss or study
bitter/hardship/pain/to suffer/to bring suffering to/painstakingly
variant of 吃[chi1]
to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])

sentences.english: Don't blame me,cause you asked for it.
sentences.chinese: 别怪我，因为你是自讨苦吃。

sentences.english: This is disgraceful and insecure: they were asking for it.
sentences.chinese: 这不安全并且让人羞愧，他们真是自讨苦吃。

sentences.english: If you play with dangerous chemicals like that you're just asking for trouble.
sentences.chinese: 如果你这样摆弄危险的化学品，那就是自讨苦吃。

sentences.english: She's asking for trouble and she'll get it before long.
sentences.chinese: 她是在自讨苦吃，不久她就会真遇上麻烦的。

sentences.english: "Why do people" brought this upon ourselves?
sentences.chinese: 人们为什么要“自讨苦吃”？

sentences.english: In appealing the case again, you will just be kicking against the pricks.
sentences.chinese: 你再上诉，那简直就是自讨苦吃。

sentences.english: You is asking for trouble if you challenge him .
sentences.chinese: 你向他挑战是自讨苦吃。

sentences.english: EG:Seriously though, you could really hurt yourself doing that.
sentences.chinese: 说正经的，你那样做可是要自讨苦吃的。

sentences.english: If you climb mountain in fog, you are asking for it.
sentences.chinese: 假如你在雾天去爬山，你是在自讨苦吃。

definition: to bring trouble on oneself
to ask for trouble/to invite difficulties
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
to invite a snub/to court a rebuff
to suffer as a consequence of one's own actions/you asked for it/to bring it on oneself (sth unpleasant)
to dig one's own grave
to reap what one has sown (idiom)/to stew in one's own juice
to overestimate one's capabilities (idiom)
to court disaster (idiom)/to dig one's own grave
to overestimate one's capabilities
to spin a cocoon around oneself (idiom); enmeshed in a trap of one's own devising/hoist by his own petard
meddling in other people's business
to bring trouble on oneself (idiom)
to move a stone and stub one's toe/to shoot oneself in the foot (idiom)
pinyin: ban1 shi2 tou5 za2 zi4 ji3 de5 jiao3

definition: to show off one's ability/to boast one's merits
to crush one's own foot while trying to maneuver a rock (to a cliff edge, to drop on one's enemy) (idiom)/hoisted by one's own petard
pinyin: ban1 qi3 shi2 tou5 za2 zi4 ji3 de5 jiao3
